The problem here is that the AnonymousTypeCompletionProposal depends on having 
a compilation unit so that the import structure can be manipulated.  Of course 
we do not have a cu in the display views or in the JavaSnippetEditor.

Current workaround is to provide subclasses of ResultCollector for the snippet 
editor and the display view and ignore anonymous type completions.

I fixed the result collector to correctly handle the anonymous type case with 
CU == null a while ago.
You can remove your subclass of ResultCollector
